title: Create a record from a license
content:
You can create request records from a license record to keep track of your IT assets more effectively. 

Note Data domain assignments aren't copied when you create a request record from a license. For more information about domains, see Data domain segmentation.

To create a record from a license:

  1. From the main menu, select Run > Software Asset > Licenses.

  2. Click the record identifier in the ID column to display the selected record.

  3. On the toolbar, click and select Create Request from record.

    Service Management displays the correct form to gather the appropriate information for the new record.

  4. Enter the details for the new record, and save the record.

    In the request record, the license record appears on the Involved CIs tab, under the Involved licenses section.

Related topics:

  • Licenses
  • How to edit a license record
  • License workflow
